overview: Dr. Centeno is an anatomic pathologist with subspecialty certification in cytopathology and subspecializing in gastrointestinal pathology. She is the primary pathologist for the pancreatic cancer research group.
research_interests:
Dr. Centeno contributes to research in pancreatic cancer dedicated to early detection and prevention strategies and is the primary pathologist for grants focused on biomarkers in pancreatic cancer..
